snippet: Anders Behring Breivik, the anti-Muslim militant who admitted to killing 77 people in a bombing and shooting spree last year, began his first day of trial with a disturbing, rod-straight salute of the arm, his fist closed tightly.
abstract: Anders Behring Breivik, the anti-Muslim militant who admitted to killing 77 people in a bombing and shooting spree last year, began his first day of trial with a disturbing, rod-straight salute of the arm, his fist closed tightly.
